alert.note: Alert for Fisher; Jones; Shackelford (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 08 at 8:32AM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Jones, Shackelford and southeastern Fisher Counties through 930 AM CST... At 832 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sylvester, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stamford, Anson, Albany, Hawley, Lueders, Moran, Sylvester, Noodle, Ibex, Avoca, Longworth, Fort Griffin, Neinda, Nugent, Hamby, Funston, Us-180 Near The Shackelford- Stephens County Line, The Intersection Of Us- 180 And Farm Road 600, Big Country Baptist Assembly and The Intersection Of Us-180 And Ranch Road 126. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
